author: InjuryMechanisms
text:
# of ACL tears have ⬆️ to 35 across the top 5 leagues
A look @ the data…

▪️45.7% overall were non-contact, directional change 
▪️⬆️ to 66.7% (in match only)
▪️Pretty evenly split between left vs right
▪️Affecting #Bundesliga & #SerieA most
▪️#EPL lowest
▪️Most occur in match https://t.co/3r4ZxXNney
